title: Court Sets Former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky’s Bail at $40M
description: Former Celsius’ boss Alex Mashinsky is set to be released on bail after agreeing to a $40 million personal recognizance bond.

title: Monochrome revises spot bitcoin ETF application in Australia
description: Australian-based asset management firm Monochrome is making another push for a licensed spot Bitcoin ETF, joining a wave of US filings.
